LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexDagger.label: eltex dagger
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexDagger.description: A medieval dagger threaded with psychic focusing materials. While it enhances the wielder’s psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, it also serves as an excellent melee weapon, as it follows the same idea as any other knife: A handle for holding and a sharp edge for cutting.
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexMace.label: eltex mace
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexMace.description: A medieval mace threaded with psychic focusing materials. While it enhances the wielder’s psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, it also serves as an excellent melee weapon, engineered for efficient swinging and deadly impacts.
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexMace.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexMace.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexSword.label: eltex sword
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexSword.description: A medieval sword threaded with psychic focusing materials. While it enhances the wielder’s psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, it also serves as an excellent melee weapon. Good for stabbing or slashing. It's light and nimble, which sometimes lets it beat bigger, heavier weapons.
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexSword.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexSword.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.VPE_MeleeWeapon_EltexSword.tools.2.label: edge
